epics.title: MVP Critical Path - Core Automation Features
epics.description: Critical features required for MVP launch including automatic splitting, investment engine, and debit card system.

epics.title: Post-MVP Feature Enhancements
epics.description: Important features to ship shortly after MVP including physical cards and copy trading.

epics.title: Future Platform Improvements
epics.description: Long-term platform improvements for scalability and user experience.

issues.title: Implement Apple Sign-In Authentication
issues.epic: MVP Critical Path - Core Automation Features
issues.description: Implement Apple Sign-In as the primary authentication method for iOS users. The social auth framework exists but Apple-specific implementation is missing.
acceptance_criteria: Users can sign up using Apple Sign-In
Apple ID tokens are validated server-side
User accounts created automatically from Apple profile
Seamless onboarding flow completes in < 2 minutes
issues.technical_notes: Extend existing social auth service in internal/domain/services/socialauth/. Add Apple provider configuration to config.go. Implement Apple ID token verification. Update auth handlers to support Apple Sign-In flow.

issues.title: Implement Automatic 70/30 Deposit Split Engine
issues.epic: MVP Critical Path - Core Automation Features
issues.description: Implement the core system rule where every deposit is automatically split 70% to Spend Balance and 30% to Invest Balance without any user interaction.
acceptance_criteria: Split occurs within 60 seconds of deposit confirmation
No user settings or allocation choices shown
Works for both crypto and fiat deposits
issues.technical_notes: Enhance funding webhook handlers in internal/workers/funding_webhook/. Integrate with allocation service. Update balance service for real-time updates. Add split logic to deposit confirmation flow.

issues.title: Implement Virtual Debit Card System
issues.epic: MVP Critical Path - Core Automation Features
issues.description: Implement virtual debit card issuance and management system. Cards should be issued immediately upon first funding and linked directly to Spend Balance.
acceptance_criteria: Virtual card issued on first funding
Card transactions deduct from Spend Balance in real-time
issues.technical_notes: Research and integrate card issuer API (Stripe Issuing, Marqeta, etc.). Create card service in internal/domain/services/card/. Add card handlers. Integrate with balance service for real-time authorization.

issues.title: Complete Automatic Investment Engine Implementation
issues.epic: MVP Critical Path - Core Automation Features
issues.description: Complete the automatic investment engine to deploy 30% invest balance without user interaction. Alpaca integration exists but auto-deployment logic is missing.
acceptance_criteria: 30% of deposits auto-invested without user action
Default investment strategy defined and implemented
No individual trades or assets shown to users
issues.technical_notes: Enhance investing service. Define global fallback strategy (diversified ETF portfolio). Add auto-investment triggers to allocation service. Integrate with existing Alpaca service.

issues.title: Setup USD/GBP Virtual Accounts via Due Network
issues.epic: MVP Critical Path - Core Automation Features
issues.description: Setup dedicated virtual accounts for USD and GBP bank transfers using the existing Due Network integration.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive unique USD virtual account details
Users receive unique GBP virtual account details
Bank transfers credited within standard timeframes
Automatic 70/30 split triggered on fiat deposits
Virtual account details accessible via API
issues.technical_notes: Extend Due Network adapter in internal/adapters/due/. Add fiat virtual account creation to onboarding flow. Update funding handlers to support fiat deposits.

issues.title: Implement Physical Debit Card System
issues.description: Implement physical card ordering, shipping, and management system for users who request physical cards.
acceptance_criteria: Physical card linked to same Spend Balance as virtual card

issues.title: Optimize KYC Flow for Sub-2-Minute Onboarding
issues.description: Optimize existing KYC flow to achieve the < 2 minute onboarding target while maintaining compliance.
acceptance_criteria: KYC completion time reduced to < 2 minutes

issues.title: Implement Copy Trading System (Conductors)
issues.description: Implement the copy trading system allowing users to follow professional investors (Conductors) and mirror their portfolios.

issues.title: Enhance Portfolio Analytics Beyond Basic Tracking
issues.description: Implement advanced portfolio analytics beyond basic balance tracking for better user insights.

issues.title: Optimize APIs for Mobile App Performance
issues.description: Create mobile-optimized API endpoints for better app performance and user experience.
